RelatedSentence: Madison County Sheriff Blake Dorning said Christopher Anthony Causey , 34 , of Hazel Green , was arrested while he was at work in the Madison County Metro Jail .
Dorning said the charge comes from an alleged altercation with his spouse .
Causey is set to be released on a $ 300 bond after a mandatory 12 - hour holding period in the jail .
